meanings.definition: Material that has been structured at the nanometer scale.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the nanostructured material under a powerful microscope.
meanings.sent2: The lab created a new nanostructured material for their research project.
meanings.sent3: The nanostructured material was so tiny, it could fit on the head of a pin.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of the nanostructured material was like a miniature city under the lens.
meanings.sent5: The uniqueness of the nanostructured material made it stand out in the experiment.

meanings.definition: Having a structure with dimensions on the nanometer scale.
meanings.sent1: The nanostructured film was used in the latest technology for its small size.
meanings.sent2: The company developed a nanostructured coating to improve product performance.
meanings.sent3: The nanostructured design of the device was both impressive and efficient.
meanings.sent4: Her jewelry sparkled like nanostructured diamonds in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The nanostructured material was delicate yet incredibly strong in its construction.
